channel.description: Recent content in Another Piece of Paradise on O linuxu

item.title: Another Piece of Paradise 01
item.description: This is a work of fiction (unfortunately). It may also contain themes and opinions that some may find objectionable. If you underage, then stop now. I’m writing in the universe of Patricia’s “Changes in Paradise,” If you have not read her magnum opus, and are interested in mermaids, then you should go right over to the Mermaid Stories group on Yahoo and read them post haste. This story assumes that you have some understanding of her fantastic vision of mers.
